name: Meerkats
description: "Hyena. Meerkat. Bull. Platypus. Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the Meerkat Nation attacked. Only the Avatar, master of spawn-camping, could stop them, but when the world needed him most, he vanished. A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar, a platypus named Turty. And although his walking skills are great, he has a lot to learn before he's ready to save anyone. But I believe Turty can save the world."
